content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Station at position(24.0, -15.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest (23.5, -16.5) containing 112 coal

###Iron Mining Station at position(-14.0, 23.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest (-14.5, 21.5) containing 583 iron ore

###Iron Smelting Area at position(-10.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (-11.0, 20.0) with 23 coal as fuel
- Stone furnace (-9.0, 20.0) with 23 coal as fuel

###Copper Processing Complex at position(22.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (20.0, 20.0)
- Input wooden chest (20.5, 21.5)
- Middle wooden chest (22.5, 21.5) containing 382 copper ore
- Stone furnace (24.0, 20.0) with 50 coal as fuel
- Output wooden chest (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Burner inserter (21.5, 21.5) moving items from input chest to middle chest
- Burner inserter (23.5, 21.5) moving items from middle chest to furnace
- Burner inserter (24.5, 18.5) moving processed plates to output chest

ERROR TIPS

### Inserter placement and configuration errors
- Ensure inserters are properly aligned with their pickup and drop positions
- Check that inserters have valid source and destination entities before placement
- Verify the direction of inserters matches the intended flow of materials

### Resource management issues
- Mining drills are out of fuel - implement regular refueling system
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and ingredients to operate efficiently

### Entity placement coordination
- When placing connected entities (like mining drill -> chest -> inserter -> furnace chains), ensure all components are properly aligned and can interact with each other
- Verify space availability before placing new entities to avoid overlap issues
